thread.title: 5 tough questions for Rutgers football coach Kyle Flood
thread.title_full: 5 tough questions for Rutgers football coach Kyle Flood

title: 5 tough questions for Rutgers football coach Kyle Flood
text:
5 tough questions for Rutgers football coach Kyle Flood Kyle Flood has some explaining to do. Post to Facebook 5 tough questions for Rutgers football coach Kyle Flood Kyle Flood has some explaining to do. Check out this story on mycentraljersey.com: http://mycj.co/1RCnS6l Cancel Send A link has been sent to your friend's email address. Posted! A link has been posted to your Facebook feed. Join the Conversation CONNECT TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
Kyle Flood has some explaining to do. 
The Rutgers football coach is expected to speak to media at noon today for the first time since he was suspended three games and fined $50,000 by the school on Sept. 16 , after an investigation determined he initiated impermissible contact with a faculty member regarding a player’s grade. 
Since then, Flood has run the program six days a week, but handed over gameday coaching and all media responsibilities to assistant head coach Norries Wilson. 
Flood will be back on the sideline Saturday at Indiana in a crucial swing game for Rutgers, but first he will be in front of the podium to face tough questions after mostly declining comment citing an ongoing investigation and releasing a prepared statement ever since controversy began. 
Here are five questions Flood figures to face regarding his own actions and the actions of those in his program: Kyle Flood won't only get questions about himself today. The @RFootball program, too. http://t.co/mFQr3wfLy4#Rutgers@RutgersU— Ryan Dunleavy (@rydunleavy) October 12, 2015
